DataElement.preferredName: Rectum Location Anatomic Site Division Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Classification of the terminal portion of the gastrointestinal tract by anatomic division.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The terminal portion of the gastrointestinal tract, extending from the rectosigmoid junction to the anal canal._Height; the vertical dimension of extension; distance from the base of something to the top._Any demarcated area of the Earth; may be determined by both natural and human boundaries._A position, site, or point in space where something can be found._Named locations of, or within, the body.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The terminal portion of the gastrointestinal tract, extending from the rectosigmoid junction to the anal canal._The process of separation into parts.
